name: Escape, by one
description:
Escape, by one is a small stealth/puzzle game. You have to escape an underground facility, to get out you need to think which item you need to pickup first so that you won't destroy items you need to use later.

Controls

W,A,S,D - Movement

R - Reload current room

Esc - Quit game (DISCLAIMER: Only works after you completed the game)

Notes

I didn't make the art of the game, all the art used comes from this pack:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
